title: DOJ sues California over ‘sanctuary’ policies
text:
DOJ sues California over ‘sanctuary’ policies 12:30pm GMT - 01:40 
The U.S. Justice Department is suing the state of California over so-called ''sanctuary'' policies that try to protect illegal immigrants against deportation, ramping up a confrontation over whether local police should enforce federal law.   
The U.S. Justice Department is suing the state of California over so-called "sanctuary" policies that try to protect illegal immigrants against deportation, ramping up a confrontation over whether local police should enforce federal law.  //reut.rs/2oWdTSr
